## Work with osmosis

- Get data from [Geofabrik](http://download.geofabrik.de/europe/germany.html)


- [Learn osmosis](http://learnosm.org/en/osm-data/osmosis/)

- Work with [osmosis](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/User:Ajoessen/Osmosis)
```shell
D:\Programme\osmosis-latest\bin\osmosis.bat --read-pbf
D:\Daten\Daten\GeoDaten\rheinland-pfalz-latest.osm.pbf
```
